mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ( WITH RankedData AS ( SELECT cilt.unty_cntrct_no, cilt.req_no, cilt.cntrct_date, cilt.thtm_cntrct_amt, cidlt.prdct_clsfc_no, cilt.cntrct_nm, cilt.dminstt_list, cilt.cntrct_instt_nm, cilt.cntrct_cncls_mthd_nm, cilt.ntce_no, cilt.cntrct_prd, cilt.base_dtls, cilt.corp_list, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY cilt.req_no ORDER BY cilt.cntrct_date ASC) AS RowNum, RANK() OVER (PARTITION BY cilt.req_no ORDER BY cilt.cntrct_date ASC) AS CntrctCnt, RANK() OVER (PARTITION BY cilt.req_no ORDER BY cilt.cntrct_date DESC) AS ReverseRank FROM contract_info_list_thing cilt INNER JOIN contract_info_detail_list_thing cidlt ON cidlt.unty_cntrct_no = cilt.unty_cntrct_no WHERE cidlt.prdct_clsfc_no IN ('39121103','39121189','41112498','41113319','39121801','39121104','39121101','39121006','46171622','41112501','39121198','43232499','81111599','39121106','41112407','21101593','60131303','43221733','41111938','39121011','43201802','47101516') GROUP BY CILT.UNTY_CNTRCT_NO ), FirstData AS ( SELECT req_no, MIN(cntrct_date) AS FirstCntrctDate, MIN(thtm_cntrct_amt) AS FirstCntrctAmt FROM RankedData GROUP BY req_no ) SELECT SUBSTRING_INDEX(SUBSTRING_INDEX(rd.corp_list, '^', 4), '^', -1) AS cmpNm, rd.cntrct_nm AS cntrctNm, SUBSTRING_INDEX(SUBSTRING_INDEX(rd.dminstt_list, '^', 3), '^', -1) AS dminsttNm, rd.cntrct_instt_nm AS dminsttNmDetail, rd.prdct_clsfc_no AS prdctClsfcNo, rd.cntrct_cncls_mthd_nm AS cntctCnclsMthdNm, rd.ntce_no AS ntceNo, date_format(fd.FirstCntrctDate, '%Y-%m-%d') AS firstCntrctDate, fd.FirstCntrctAmt AS firstCntrctAmt, date_format(rd.cntrct_date, '%Y-%m-%d') AS cntrctDate, rd.thtm_cntrct_amt AS thtmCntrctAmt, rd.CntrctCnt AS cntrctCnt, CASE WHEN rd.ReverseRank = 1 THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS finalCntrctYn, rd.unty_cntrct_no, rd.req_no, rd.cntrct_prd, rd.base_dtls, REPLACE(SUBSTRING_INDEX(SUBSTRING_INDEX(rd.corp_list, '^', 10), '^', -1), ']', '') AS cmpNo FROM RankedData rd LEFT JOIN FirstData fd ON rd.req_no = fd.req_no ORDER BY rd.req_no DESC, rd.cntrct_date DESC ) as T
